50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] used to seek refuge with Allah from five things, saying: "Seek refuge with Allah from the torment of the grave, and from the torment of Hell, and from the trials of life and death, and from the evil of Al-Masihid-Dajjal

chapter.eng-name: Seeking Refuge from the Trials of Life
